question.title: Android studio Layout look different in editor and device
question.body:
I have a background image that I want to use as a reference for sub-items ImageView, TextView and sub-layout.

In the Android Studio layout editor, subitems are placed correctly, but when the app is downloaded to the device, items are out of place compared to the layout editor view.

How can I get an item constrained to the main background image so that sub-items stay at the correct position relative to the background image?

The device is connected to Arduino via Bluetooth to show fuel heater status.

Here is my code:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".MainActivity"
    android:background="@color/green">

    <!-- Begin of AppBarLayout -->
    <com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout
        android:id="@+id/toolbarLayout"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content">

        <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="match_parent">

            <androidx.appcompat.widget.Toolbar
                android:id="@+id/myToolbar"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:background="?attr/colorPrimary"
                android:minHeight="?attr/actionBarSize"
                android:theme="?attr/actionBarTheme"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.0"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
                app:title="@string/app_name" />

            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/settingButton"
                android:layout_width="40dp"
                android:layout_height="40dp"
                android:layout_marginEnd="8dp"
                android:adjustViewBounds="true"
                android:onClick="settingsClick"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
                app:srcCompat="@drawable/ic_settings" />

            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/bluetoothButton"
                android:layout_width="40dp"
                android:layout_height="40dp"
                android:layout_marginEnd="8dp"
                android:adjustViewBounds="true"
                android:onClick="bluetoothClick"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/settingButton"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
                app:srcCompat="@drawable/ic_bluetooth" />

        </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
    </com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout>
    <!-- End of AppBarLayout -->

    <!-- Begin of Main content -->
    <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
        android:id="@+id/mainContent"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent"
        app:layout_behavior="@string/appbar_scrolling_view_behavior"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/toolbarLayout">

        <!-- Begin of Top layout (header below AppBar) -->
        <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
            android:id="@+id/infoLayout"
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">

            <!-- -->
            <!-- Plug icon, hide when not connected -->
            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/plugIcon"
                android:layout_width="30dp"
                android:layout_height="30dp"
                android:layout_marginStart="16dp"
                android:layout_marginTop="15dp"
                android:layout_marginBottom="5dp"
                android:adjustViewBounds="true"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.0"
                app:srcCompat="@drawable/ic_plug_icon" />

            <!-- Battery icon -->
            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/batteryIcon"
                android:layout_width="30dp"
                android:layout_height="30dp"
                android:layout_marginStart="16dp"
                android:layout_marginTop="15dp"
                android:layout_marginBottom="5dp"
                android:adjustViewBounds="true"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/dispBatteryVoltage"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/plugIcon"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.0"
                app:srcCompat="@drawable/ic_battery_icon" />

            <!-- Battery voltage display -->
            <TextView
                android:id="@+id/dispBatteryVoltage"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_marginStart="5dp"
                android:layout_marginTop="23dp"
                android:layout_marginBottom="13dp"
                android:text="Voltage"
                android:textColor="@color/white"
                android:textSize="10dp"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/batteryIcon"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />

            <!-- Outside temperature icon -->
            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/outTempIcon"
                android:layout_width="30dp"
                android:layout_height="30dp"
                android:layout_marginStart="64dp"
                android:layout_marginTop="15dp"
                android:layout_marginBottom="5dp"
                android:adjustViewBounds="true"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/dispOutTemp"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/batteryIcon"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
                app:srcCompat="@drawable/ic_outside_temp" />

            <!-- Outside Temperature display -->
            <TextView
                android:id="@+id/dispOutTemp"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_marginStart="5dp"
                android:layout_marginTop="23dp"
                android:layout_marginBottom="13dp"
                android:text="Outside Temp"
                android:textColor="@color/white"
                android:textSize="10dp"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/outTempIcon"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />

            <!-- Time sync OK icon -->
            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/timeSyncIcon"
                android:layout_width="33dp"
                android:layout_height="29dp"
                android:layout_marginTop="15dp"
                android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"
                android:layout_marginBottom="5dp"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/testModeIcon"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
                app:srcCompat="@drawable/ic_clock_sync_disable" />

            <!-- test mode icon -->
            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/testModeIcon"
                android:layout_width="30dp"
                android:layout_height="30dp"
                android:layout_marginTop="15dp"
                android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"
                android:layout_marginBottom="5dp"
                android:onClick="testModeClick"
                tools:ignore="UsingOnClickInXml"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
                app:srcCompat="@drawable/ic_tools"
                />
        </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

        <!-- Background image, heater layout -->

        <!-- Engine boost request button -->
        <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
            android:id="@+id/heaterWrapper"
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="0dp"
            android:layout_margin="8dp"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/infoLayout"
            app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/ctrlLayout"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
            android:background="@drawable/layout_outline"
            >

            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/heaterLayout"
                android:layout_width="0dp"
                android:layout_height="0dp"
                android:adjustViewBounds="true"
                android:scaleType="fitCenter"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintDimensionRatio="0.77"
                app:srcCompat="@drawable/ic_heater_layout"/>

            <!-- Engine boost request button -->

            <!-- Cabin blower auto start enable -->

            <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
                android:id="@+id/layoutEngineBoostButton"
                android:layout_width="55dp"
                android:layout_height="55dp"
                android:layout_alignParentTop="true"
                android:layout_alignParentEnd="true"
                android:background="@drawable/layout_outline"
                android:clickable="true"
                android:focusable="true"
                android:onClick="engineBoostReq"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="@+id/heaterLayout"

                app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.084"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.036"
                tools:ignore="UsingOnClickInXml">

                <!-- Engine running status text view -->
                <TextView
                    android:id="@+id/dispEngineRun"
                    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:text="RUN"
                    android:textAlignment="center"
                    android:textColor="@color/white"
                    android:textSize="12sp"
                    app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@+id/layoutEngineBoostButton"
                    app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="@+id/layoutEngineBoostButton"
                    app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.516"
                    app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/layoutEngineBoostButton"
                    app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/layoutEngineBoostButton"
                    app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.589" />
            </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

            <!-- Fuel tank empty icon -->

            <!-- Fuel line fill icon -->

            <!-- Fuel pump rate display -->

            <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
                android:id="@+id/layoutCabEnaButton"
                android:layout_width="55dp"
                android:layout_height="55dp"
                android:layout_alignParentTop="true"
                android:layout_alignParentEnd="true"
                android:background="@drawable/layout_outline"
                android:clickable="true"
                android:focusable="true"
                android:onClick="cabinBlowerEnable"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.582"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.036"
                tools:ignore="UsingOnClickInXml">

            </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/tankIcon"
                android:layout_width="30dp"
                android:layout_height="30dp"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.191"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.442"
                app:srcCompat="@drawable/ic_tank" />

            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/refillIcon"
                android:layout_width="30dp"
                android:layout_height="30dp"
                android:onClick="fuelPumpCtrl"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.505"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.39"
                app:srcCompat="@drawable/ic_fill_line"
                tools:ignore="UsingOnClickInXml" />

            <TextView
                android:id="@+id/dispPumpRate"
                android:layout_width="45dp"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:text="200 ml/h"
                android:textAlignment="viewEnd"
                android:textColor="@color/white"
                android:textSize="11sp"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.401"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.488" />

            <!-- Combustion blower speed display -->

            <!-- Glow plug voltage display -->

            <!-- Coolant temperature display -->
            <TextView
                android:id="@+id/dispFanSpeed"
                android:layout_width="30dp"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:text="100 %"
                android:textAlignment="viewEnd"
                android:textColor="@color/white"
                android:textSize="11sp"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.351"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.709" />

            <!-- Flame temperature display -->
            <TextView
                android:id="@+id/dispGlowPlug"
                android:layout_width="41dp"
                android:layout_height="14dp"
                android:text="10.00 V"
                android:textAlignment="viewEnd"
                android:textColor="@color/white"
                android:textSize="11sp"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.545"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.723" />

            <LinearLayout
                android:id="@+id/layoutFlameTemp"
                android:layout_width="120dp"
                android:layout_height="50dp"
                android:layout_alignParentTop="true"
                android:layout_alignParentEnd="true"
                android:layout_marginTop="12dp"
                android:orientation="horizontal"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/layoutCltTemp"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/layoutCltTemp"
                tools:ignore="UseCompoundDrawables">

                <ImageView
                    android:id="@+id/flameIcon"
                    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_height="match_parent"
                    android:adjustViewBounds="true"
                    app:srcCompat="@drawable/ic_thermometer_flame" />

                <TextView
                    android:id="@+id/dispFlameTemp"
                    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:text="Flame Temp"
                    android:textColor="@color/white"
                    android:textSize="11sp" />
            </LinearLayout>

            <LinearLayout
                android:id="@+id/layoutCltTemp"
                android:layout_width="120dp"
                android:layout_height="50dp"
                android:layout_alignParentTop="true"
                android:layout_alignParentEnd="true"
                android:orientation="horizontal"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.92"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/heaterLayout"
                app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.367">

                <ImageView
                    android:id="@+id/cltIcon"
                    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_height="match_parent"
                    android:adjustViewBounds="true"
                    app:srcCompat="@drawable/ic_coolant_temp" />

                <LinearLayout
                    android:id="@+id/cltOverheatTempLayout"
                    android:layout_width="match_parent"
                    android:layout_height="match_parent"
                    android:orientation="vertical">

                    <TextView
                        android:id="@+id/dispCoolantTemp"
                        android:layout_width="match_parent"
                        android:layout_height="0dp"
                        android:layout_weight="1"
                        android:text="Coolant"
                        android:textColor="@color/white"
                        android:textSize="11sp" />

                    <TextView
                        android:id="@+id/dispOverheatTemp"
                        android:layout_width="match_parent"
                        android:layout_height="0dp"
                        android:layout_weight="1"
                        android:text="Overheat"
                        android:textColor="#FFFFFF"
                        android:textSize="11sp" />
                </LinearLayout>
            </LinearLayout>

        </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

        <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
            android:id="@+id/ctrlLayout"
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="81dp"
            app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent">

            <TextView
                android:id="@+id/dispCycleTime"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_marginStart="8dp"
                android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"
                android:text="Cycle Time"
                android:textColor="@color/green_on"
                android:textSize="11sp"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />

            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/buttonOn"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="match_parent"
                android:layout_marginEnd="45dp"
                android:layout_marginBottom="24dp"
                android:adjustViewBounds="true"
                android:onClick="startHeaterClick"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
                app:srcCompat="@drawable/ic_on_text" />

            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/buttonOff"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="match_parent"
                android:layout_marginEnd="35dp"
                android:layout_marginBottom="24dp"
                android:adjustViewBounds="true"
                android:onClick="stopHeaterClick"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/buttonOn"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
                app:srcCompat="@drawable/ic_off_text" />

        </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

    </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

</androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout>

Android Studio layout editor:

Device screenshot (OnePlus 9):

I have tried different layout types and constraints and biases.

How do I get overlay items to show in the correct places on the device?
